pr_title: DEV-1101 Integrate pipeline5 with bcl2fastq on GCP

timeline.message:
DEV-1101 Fix bugs found in initial integration

Fastq files were not getting picked up when listing the runtime bucket. Fastq filenames should have
the flowcell name included as the second token.

DEV-1101 Add integration for fastq located in GCP to the pipeline

Adds a toggle that once enabled, will upload fastq input from GCP rather than the SBP S3.
The location of the fastq is still taken from the SBP API (run->sample->fastq).

Also updated the Bcl2Fastq command thread settings to match production.
DEV-1101 Use correct main in docker container
DEV-1101 Remove private key path from docker profile
DEV-1101 Remove private key path from docker profile
DEV-1101 Remove private key path from docker profile

timeline.author: nedleitch
nedleitch

timeline.bodyText: We have had surprises in the past, would it be wise to check the filename conforms to expectations?
timeline.author: nedleitch

replies.bodyText: hmm, as this file convention is produced by the version of bcl2fastq also in this codebase I think its fine to have this implicit dependency on the filename.
replies.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.message: DEV-1101 Still link flowcell, samples, fastq on flowcell QC fail

DEV-1101 Review comments

Use jax-rs constants for created status.
